oneOf.description: Male who has an address outside United Kingdom and Isle of Man, and retires before 6 October 2018. Unable to automate currently, manual intervention required.
The customer has National Insurance contributions from the Isle of Man. Manual separation of National Insurance record required, customer should contact the National Insurance Helpline.
Contention between amounts on internal systems. There is contention between the pension amounts in the internal systems, therefore a reliable forecast cannot be provided.
The current date is equal to or greater than the day before the customer’s State Pension date. The customer is eligible for State Pension and therefore we do not provide a forecast.

earningsIncludedUpTo.description: The date which the calculations are based on. This is always the end date of the last posted tax year

protectedPayment.description: Whether the customer has an amount higher than the full rate at the end of the 2015/16 tax year

weeklyAmount.description: The amount of accrued State Pension to date each week

monthlyAmount.description: The amount of accrued State Pension to date each month

annualAmount.description: The amount of accrued State Pension to date each year

yearsToWork.description: The number of future qualifying years needed to get the forecast amount

weeklyAmount.description: The forecasted amount of State Pension each week

monthlyAmount.description: The forecasted amount of State Pension each month

annualAmount.description: The forecasted amount of State Pension each year

yearsToWork.description: The number of future qualifying years needed to get the most amount possible after paying all gaps

gapsToFill.description: The total number of payable gaps - using this field may result in the customer filling more gaps than necessary

weeklyAmount.description: The maximum amount of State Pension each week

monthlyAmount.description: The maximum amount of State Pension each month

annualAmount.description: The maximum amount of State Pension each year

weeklyAmount.description: The amount of Contracted Out Pension Equivalent each week

monthlyAmount.description: The amount of Contracted Out Pension Equivalent every month

annualAmount.description: The amount of Contracted Out Pension Equivalent each year

additionalStatePension.description: The amount of Additional State Pension

graduatedRetirementBenefit.description: The amount of Graduated Retirement Benefit

pensionAge.description: The customer’s age when they can claim State Pension

pensionDate.description: The date the customer can claim State Pension

finalRelevantYear.description: The last full tax year before the customer’s State Pension date, for example 2017/18 with a date of 6 July 2018

numberOfQualifyingYears.description: The number of qualifying years of National Insurance

pensionSharingOrder.description: Whether the customer has a ‘pension sharing order’ in effect

currentWeeklyPensionAmount.description: The full rate of State Pension each week

reducedRateElection.description: Whether the customer has a ‘reduced rate election’ in force at the beginning of the tax year 35 years before the tax year of State Pension age
